John McCain: John McCain voted for the appointment of Justice Roberts. McCain favors a more Constructionist standpoint and says he would work to safeguard against Judicial activism.[160]

Barack Obama: Barack Obama was 1 of 22 Senators to vote against the appointment of Justice Roberts.
